===Etymology===
From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*siŋ ~ sik||wood}}. Cognate with {{cog|bo|ཤིང||tree, wood}} and {{cog|my|သစ်||log, timber, wood}}. Compare its phonetic component {{och-l|新|new}} and {{cog|my|သစ်||new}}.
